title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include selecting “ −y ” and for a justification describing the correct use of the right hand rule.
The response accurately includes selecting “ −y ” and for a justification describing the correct use of the right hand rule.

title: Part B(ii)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

If the coil is considered a long solenoid, then the magnetic field inside the solenoid is constant and selecting “Equal to” with this justification receives full credit.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include selecting “Less than” and a correct justification.
The response accurately includes selecting “Less than” and a correct justification.
